https://thekozm.com/product/original-zip.productDescription: The name says it all. Old school, one-piece hood, modern ghost side pockets and a classic front zip. Modern slim silhouette perfectly cropped right at the waist.

https://thekozm.com/product/sweatshirt-c.productDescription: The Kozm crew is an instant classic and is the 2nd of 4 styles in our A|S (All Seasons) French Terry collection. Dressing down never looked so good.

https://thekozm.com/product/no-slack-pan.productDescription: A chino cut inspired “sweat pant” which is the 1st of 4 styles in our A|S (All Seasons) French Terry collection. It’s slim fitting, with enough room at the hips, and tapered at the ankles with a chino pant hem (no sport elastic here), these pants make looking sharp more comfortable than ever.

A chino cut inspired “sweat pant” which is the 1st of 4 styles in our A|S (All Seasons) French Terry collection. It’s slim fitting, with enough room at the hips, and tapered at the ankles with a chino pant hem (no sport elastic here), these pants make looking sharp more comfortable than ever.

https://thekozm.com/product/wild-in-the-.productDescription: This is a comfortable fit that says, “style matters.” The 4th of 4 styles in our A|S (All Seasons French Terry) collection, it is slim at the thighs, cut above the knees, with some room at the hips and a sewn performance gusset. These are definitely not your brother-in-law’s basketball shorts. Perfect for before/after your practice. Heck, even during.

https://thekozm.com/product/baja-hoodie/.productDescription: This woven hemp/recycled PET blend has a lightweight hand with a smooth finish. Inspired by the ponchos we grew up wearing on Baja trips, updated with Kozm design, this pullover hides the grime on your tee and provides a light layer when the sun is scarce. Pouch pockets, drawcord hood and hem, no zip.
